  • public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object

    Static Methods : Geometry

    Methods are commonly used to break a problem down into small manageable pieces This also allows for efficiencies, since the method can be called as many times as needed without rewriting the code each time. Note: Giving proper comments in your program makes it more user friendly and it is assumed as a high quality code.
